DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether denufosol tetrasodium ( INS37217 ) Intravitreal Injection well tolerate potential treat uveitis associate macular edema .
DOC.brief_title: Study Treat Uveitis Associated Macular Edema
DOC.detailed_description: Denufosol tetrasodium ( INS37217 ) Intravitreal Injection may provide clinical benefit treatment uveitis associate macular edema ( UME ) reduce retinal thickness measure OCT possibly enable recovery vision loss associate UME . Denufosol tetrasodium may also reverse fluid accumulation UME .
DOC.criteria: Have anterior uveitis , intermediate uveitis , posterior uveitis panuveitis least one eye Have persistent macular edema uveitis whose condition stable Have change medication regimen least 3 month prior randomization currently take medication immunosuppressive antiinflammatory agent ; steroidal nonsteroidal agent ( drop , oral inject ) Have OCT scan qualify retinal thickness study eye Have evidence macular edema OCT scan Have lease one eligible eye treat study base visual acuity . Have proliferative vitreoretinopathy great grade B Have subretinal vitreous hemorrhage , corneal opacity , condition , limit view retina obscure FA Have uncontrollable elevate IOP , advance , previous filtration surgery , current evidence endophthalmitis study eye Have ocular disorder study eye may confound interpretation study result Have cataract surgery study eye within 3 month , YAG laser capsulotomy within past 1 month , intraocular surgery within past 90 day Have preoperative spherical equivalent refractive error 10 diopter myopia study eye Have intravitreal periocular injection corticosteroid study eye 3 month prior screen Have ocular implant device delivery therapeutic agent eye Be take excluded medication could obscure confound study result
